channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.30
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.30 Release Notes

Performance Update

This update focuses on making NameQuick faster and more efficient. The app can now handle large number of files easily.

What’s Changed

Files Loading - Files load faster when you open the app - Scrolling is smoother, especially with lots of files - The app remembers which folders you use most and loads those first

Search - Search is noticeably faster - Results show up without delay - Works better with partial matches and typos

Memory Usage - Uses less RAM - Doesn’t slow down other apps as much - Handles large files collections better

General Speed - App starts up faster - Everything responds quicker when you click - Less waiting around for things to happen

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed slowdowns that happened after using the app for a while
  • Fixed crashes with very large file collections
  • Better recovery when something goes wrong

What’s Next

This is the first step in the performance improvement journey. The next update will include: - More performance enhancements - UI improvements to make the app more intuitive and easier to use - Better visual feedback for all operations

If you notice any issues with this update, please let me know.
